barbi-map documentation

barbi-map documentation#

This is the (very short) documentation for Barbillon resulting cumulative map as derived by YGK. Some short explanations are tests are shown as well as an example on how to use it.

How is the map calculated?

How to use it?

The map is provided as it is and some caution should be taken depending on what science you do, as there are many limitations associated to it. Mainly:

  1. There are many holes in the map, where no stars have been detected. Mainly above and below the galactic plane (approx. \(|b-90| \geq 30\) at max distance)

  2. There are few stars in general (around 1 to 2 million, as opposed to 500 million in Bayestar), so the uncertainties are high.
